verses.text: Unto \w the|strong="H1121"\w* end, \w a|strong="H1121"\w* \w psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Core.
Hear these \w things|strong="H6944"\w*, \w all|strong="H1419"\w* ye nations: give ear, \w all|strong="H1419"\w* ye inhabitants \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* world.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H0776"\w* earthborn, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* sons \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w*: \w both|strong="H3605"\w* rich \w and|strong="H0776"\w* poor together.

\w My|strong="H3045"\w* mouth \w shall|strong="H3045"\w* speak wisdom: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* meditation \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* heart understanding.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* incline \w my|strong="H3588"\w* ear \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* parable; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* open \w my|strong="H3588"\w* proposition on \w the|strong="H3588"\w* psaltery.

\w Why|strong="H3651"\w* shall \w I|strong="H3651"\w* fear \w in|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* evil day? \w the|strong="H7200"\w* iniquity \w of|strong="H7200"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* heel shall encompass \w me|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w They|strong="H8033"\w* \w that|strong="H8033"\w* trust \w in|strong="H8033"\w* \w their|strong="H8033"\w* own strength, \w and|strong="H8033"\w* glory \w in|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* multitude \w of|strong="H3205"\w* \w their|strong="H8033"\w* riches,
No brother \w can|strong="H7307"\w* redeem, nor shall man redeem: \w he|strong="H7307"\w* shall not give \w to|strong="H7307"\w* God \w his|strong="H7665"\w* ransom,

Nor \w the|strong="H0834"\w* price \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* redemption \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* soul: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* labour \w for|strong="H6635"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*,
\w And|strong="H0430"\w* shall still \w live|strong="H7130"\w* unto \w the|strong="H7130"\w* end.

\w He|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H0776"\w* see destruction, \w when|strong="H4390"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* see \w the|strong="H5921"\w* wise dying: \w the|strong="H5921"\w* senseless \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* fool \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* perish \w together|strong="H5921"\w*: \w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* leave \w their|strong="H5921"\w* riches \w to|strong="H5921"\w* strangers:

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* their sepulchres \w shall|strong="H3063"\w* \w be|strong="H6726"\w* their houses \w for|strong="H4616"\w* ever. Their dwelling places \w to|strong="H4616"\w* all generations: they \w have|strong="H3063"\w* called their lands \w by|strong="H1323"\w* their names.

\w And|strong="H5437"\w* man when he was \w in|strong="H5437"\w* honour did not understand; he \w is|strong="H6726"\w* compared \w to|strong="H5437"\w* senseless beasts, \w and|strong="H5437"\w* \w is|strong="H6726"\w* become like \w to|strong="H5437"\w* them.

\w This|strong="H4616"\w* way \w of|strong="H3820"\w* theirs \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w a|strong="H7896"\w* stumblingblock \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w them|strong="H7896"\w*: \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w afterwards|strong="H0314"\w* \w they|strong="H5608"\w* \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* delight \w in|strong="H1755"\w* \w their|strong="H7896"\w* mouth.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H0430"\w* laid \w in|strong="H5921"\w* hell \w like|strong="H5921"\w* sheep: \w death|strong="H4192"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* feed \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*. \w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w just|strong="H2088"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* dominion \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w morning|strong="H2088"\w*; \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* help \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* decay \w in|strong="H5921"\w* hell \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* glory.
But God will redeem my soul from the hand of hell, when he shall receive me.
Be not thou afraid, when a man shall be made rich, and when the glory of his house shall be increased.
For when he shall die he shall take nothing away; nor shall his glory descend with him.
For in his lifetime his soul will be blessed: and he will praise thee when thou shalt do well to him.
He shall go in to the generations of his fathers: and he shall never see light.
Man when he was in honour did not understand: he hath been compared to senseless beasts, and made like to them.
